import sys

sys.path.append("/home/jovyan/max.ai.ds.core/")
import pytest
from unittest.mock import patch, MagicMock

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.ml.linalg import DenseVector
from pyspark.ml.feature import VectorAssembler

from pysparkling import *

from maxairesources.factory.model_factory import ModelFactory

params = [
    {
        "model": "H2OPCAMAX",
        "kwargs": {"id_col": None, "target_col": None, "params": {"k":3}, "param_grid": {}},

[docs]@pytest.fixture(params=params, scope="class")
def model_init(request):
    request.cls.model = ModelFactory.get_model(**request.param)




[docs]@pytest.mark.usefixtures("model_init")
class TestUnsupervisedModels(object):

[docs]    @classmethod
    def setup_class(cls):
        cls.spark = (
            SparkSession.builder.master("local[2]")
                .appName("unsupervised-models-test")
                .getOrCreate()
        )
        conf = H2OConf().setInternalClusterMode()
        hc = H2OContext.getOrCreate()
        data = [
            (10.8, 2.33, 11.5, 1.0),
            (8.11, 3.53, 13.5, 0.0),
            (7.30, 3.81, 15.5, 0.0),
            (6.45, 4.41, 14.5, 1.0),
            (13.8, 1.92, 9.15, 1.0),
            (18.1, 0.03, 2.15, 0.0),
            (27.3, 0.81, 1.50, 1.0),
            (15.4, 0.90, 11.5, 0.0),
        ]
        cols = ("f3", "f1", "f2", "label")
        cls.data = cls.spark.createDataFrame(data, cols)



[docs]    def test_fit_model(self):
        self.model.fit(self.data)
        assert True



[docs]    def test_predict_model(self):
        op = self.model.predict(self.data)
        assert True



[docs]    def test_save_model(self):
        self.model.save("/tmp/model")
        assert True



[docs]    def test_load_model(self):
        self.model.load("/tmp/model")
        result = self.model.predict(self.data)
        assert True



[docs]    @classmethod
    def teardown_class(cls):
        cls.spark.stop()
